name: Sat-crimebusters
body:
### Sea vessel tracking using Satellite AIS data

The Satellite Crimebusters team, at the June 2014 Inventorthon, analysed [AIS data](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Automatic_Identification_System) obtained via [satellite](http://www.exactearth.com/technology/satellite-ais/).
The event was hosted by the [Satellite Applications Catapult](https://sa.catapult.org.uk/) in Harwell.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
